name: Titanium.UI.DashboardView
summary: A dashboard view is an iOS Springboard-like view of Titanium.UI.DashboardItem items that may be deleted and reordered by the user using its built-in edit mode.

events.name: click
events.summary: Fired when the device detects a click against the view.
events.description:
There is a subtle difference between singletap and click events.

A singletap event is generated when the user taps the screen briefly without moving their finger. This gesture will also generate a click event.

However, a click event can also be generated when the user touches, moves their finger, and then removes it from the screen.

On Android, a click event can also be generated by a trackball click.

properties.name: location
properties.summary: Coordinates x and y of the event from the parent view's coordinate system.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

events.name: commit
events.description: This event is invoked by the stopEditing method.

events.name: delete
events.summary: Fired when an item is deleted in edit mode.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

events.name: dragend
events.summary: Fired when an item finishes being dragged in edit mode.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

events.name: dragstart
events.summary: Fired when an item starts being dragged in edit mode.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

events.name: edit
events.description: This event is invoked by a longpress of a Titanium.UI.DashboardItem item or the startEditing method.

events.name: move
events.summary: Fired when an item is moved in edit mode.

properties.name: items
properties.summary: List of items to be committed, possibly in new order, when edit mode ends.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

events.name: pagechanged
events.summary: Fired when the current page of the dashboard view changes.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

methods.name: startEditing
methods.description: This method causes the edit event to fire.

methods.name: stopEditing
methods.description: This method causes the commit event to fire.

properties.name: columnCount
properties.summary: The number of columns of items in the view.

properties.name: editable
properties.summary: Determines whether edit mode is activated by a longpress of an item.
properties.description: Set to false to prevent a longpress from activating edit mode.

properties.name: rowCount
properties.summary: The number of rows of items in the view.

properties.name: wobble
properties.summary: Determines whether the wobble visual editing cue is enabled in edit mode.
properties.description:
Set to false to disable wobble effect.

Must be defined before edit mode is activated in order to take effect.
